text: Cee Lo's Magic Moment is the first Christmas studio album and overall fourth studio album by American singer Cee Lo Green on October 29, 2012 in the United Kingdom. It was released in the US on October 30 by Elektra Records. Green's versions of "Mary, Did You Know?" and "What Christmas Means to Me" were well- liked by the listeners. The album has sold many copies. ==Background== In the album, Green sings classic Christmas and seasonal songs in his own way. Rod Stewart, Christina Aguilera, Straight No Chaser, Trombone Shorty and The Muppets also sing with Green in the album. Stewart and The Muppets performed with Green the album's tracks at the Planet Hollywood Resort and Casino in Las Vegas on October 10, 2012. A music video was produced for "All I Need Is Love", which featured Cee-Lo, many of The Muppets and Craig Robinson. ==Track listing== ===Chart positions=== Chart (2012) Peak position US Billboard 200 25 US Billboard R&B;/Hip-Hop Albums 4 US Holiday Albums 6 ==Release history== Region Date Format(s) Label United Kingdom October 29, 2012 CD, digital download Warner Bros. United States October 30, 2012 CD, digital download Elektra ==References== Category:2012 albums
title: Cee Lo's Magic Moment
